alert.note: Alert for Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 11:38PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern De Soto and northwestern Sabine Parishes, eastern Shelby, northeastern San Augustine and northern Sabine Counties through 1245 AM CST... At 1138 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Logansport to 8 miles northeast of Patroon to near Bland Lake. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milam, Zwolle, Converse, Patroon, Bland Lake, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Huxley, Noble, Stanley, Sexton, Belmont, Pelican, Toledo Bend Reservoir North and Jordans Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
